p: Pharmacological activities: Previous studies reported the various pharmacological properties of curcuminoids such as neuroprotective, analgesic, antiproliferative, anti-inflammatory, anticancer, antidiabetic, hypocholesterolemic, antithrombotic, antihepatotoxic, antidiarrheal, carminative, diuretic, antirheumatic, hypotensive, antimicrobial, antiviral, antioxidant, larvicidal, insecticidal, antivenomous and antityrosinase effects [ 97].
